Articles.Content:
Hi everyone!

Been playing KSP since December, but I'm only just now getting around to joining up here.  Some of the threads have been very helpful (especially with regards to orbital rendezvous and docking.)  Been to Mun and Minmus, built a small science station in Mun orbit, and I'm trying to get to Duna, but that's been a whole series of disasters.  Still learning.

Hello dexeron and welcome to the forum!

There seems to always be lots more to learn for me when playing KSP.  The forum is just the place to learn what you need.  Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

Yupp hullo errm, hello and welcome to the utter crazy KSP forums.

We are serious rocketscientists.
